  • Method Details

    • partyColor

      public Color partyColor()
      Generates a random color for the cell from a pre-defined list of colors.
      Returns:
      A randomly selected color.

    • setPartyAge

      public void setPartyAge()
      Resets the age of the cell to zero.

    • decide

      public void decide()
      Determines the state of the cell based on its current age. If the age is 20 or more, the age is reset to zero. If the age is between 15 and 20, the cell dies. Otherwise, the cell remains alive.
      Specified by:
      decide in interface domain.Item
      Overrides:
      decide in class domain.Cell

    • getTicTacs

      public void getTicTacs()
      Generates a new CellParty object at a random location in the CellularAutomata grid.
